channel.title: About on Sadegh Hayeri
channel.description: Recent content in About on Sadegh Hayeri

item.title: Notable Projects
item.description: Cheapsi (closed-source) Android/IOS application for Snapp and Tapsi to save both your money and time. (ReactNative) GreenTunnel GreenTunnel bypasses DPI services without changing IP or server endpoints. Mili Mili is an open source tool for auto login to MikroTik routers with multi-user support SelfBalancingRobot A two-wheel self-balancing robot based on Arduino and RaspberryPi board.
item.content:
• Cheapsi (closed-source)

Android/IOS application for Snapp and Tapsi to save both your money and time. (ReactNative)

  • GreenTunnel

GreenTunnel bypasses DPI services without changing IP or server endpoints.

  • Mili

Mili is an open source tool for auto login to MikroTik routers with multi-user support

  • SelfBalancingRobot

A two-wheel self-balancing robot based on Arduino and RaspberryPi board.

Video:
